p: Each sample solution (0.1 mL) was added to FRAP reagent (2 mL) containing acetate buffer (0.3 M, pH 3.6), 2,4,6-tris(2-pyridyl)- s-triazine (TPTZ) (10 mM) in 40 mM HCl, and ferric chloride (20 mM) in a ratio of 10:1:1 ( v/ v/ v). Then, the absorbance was read at 593 nm after a 30-min incubation at room temperature. Results are expressed as milligrams of trolox equivalent per gram of extract (TE/g extract) [ 22].
